definition: to cut/to slash/to scratch (cut into the surface of sth)/to strike (a match)
to delimit/to transfer/to assign/to plan/to draw (a line)/stroke of a Chinese character

sentences.english: You heard Dr. turtle scratch-free car wash do?
sentences.chinese: 您聽說過龜博士的免劃痕洗車嗎？

sentences.english: Gently scratch your nail over the item to make sure that it won’t scratch or peel.
sentences.chinese: 輕輕地用指甲刮首飾，以確保不會有劃痕或者掉皮。

sentences.english: Jade is always cool to the touch and will resist to scratching with metal.
sentences.chinese: 玉摸上去總是涼涼的，而且還能抗金屬劃痕。

sentences.english: How were you able to fix that scratch?
sentences.chinese: 你怎麼修好那個劃痕的？

sentences.english: The reason why the nucleation rate is slow on the unscratched surface is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了不經劃痕處理的基材形核率低的原因。

sentences.english: Nicking and making incision on callus surfaces was helpful for shoot differentiation.
sentences.chinese: 愈傷組織的表面劃痕和再次切割有利於再生芽的分化。

sentences.english: In this photo, we see scratches where the pick tool was used to lift the pin.
sentences.chinese: 在插圖中我們可以看到單鉤在撥動珠子是留下的劃痕。

sentences.english: Learn about fixing scratches in wood furniture in this free home carpentry video.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解有關固定在這個自由家木傢俱木工視頻劃痕。

sentences.english: Don't be fooled by claims that color-matched waxes can remove scratches.
sentences.chinese: 別愚蠢的跟人家說，有顏色的蠟可以去除劃痕。

sentences.english: Karo men and women are known for their ritual scarification .
sentences.chinese: 卡羅男人和女人是衆所周知的，他們祭祀劃痕。

sentences.english: Iron or wrought iron can also be washed with dish wash powder without causing scratches.
sentences.chinese: 鐵或熟鐵也可洗洗碗粉，而不會造成劃痕。

sentences.english: And then to South Bridge, the distant stars, still see the scratches.
sentences.chinese: 再到南橋上，遙遠星辰，猶見劃痕。

sentences.english: Aggregate hardness can be measured using the Mohs Hardness Scratch Test.
sentences.chinese: 總計硬度可利用層數硬度劃痕測試。

sentences.english: Meguiar's pure polishes can be used to eliminate fine scratches and create incredible high gloss not possible with wax type products.
sentences.chinese: 它也可用於去除劃痕，而後產生難以置信的光滑效果。

sentences.english: Do the scratch test. Gently scratch your nail over the item to make sure that it won't scratch or peel.
sentences.chinese: 輕輕地用指甲刮首飾，以確保不會有劃痕或者掉皮。

sentences.english: This makes such a screen vulnerable to scratches and other minor damage.
sentences.chinese: 這使得屏幕非常容易產生劃痕。

definition: water spot/water stain/wet spot/damp patch/water damage
